description.narrative:
Funding for the Business and Human Rights Resource Centre (BHRC) to complete activities in the Pacific which strengthen the regional business and human rights movement and facilitate the growth of strong networks throughout the region (focused on business and human rights). Grant activities being funded are 1) Building a comprehensive picture of business and human rights issues and actors with a focus on the Pacfic region 2) developing and Leveraging a dedicated web portal on business and human rights in the Pacific 3) Engaging with companies on their human rights performance 4)Building awareness of business and human rights issues, frameworks, resources and mechanisms by delivering workshops and training events to empower local advocates to identify and implement innovative ways to engage with key stakeholders
The total estimated value of this investment is $47.0 thousand to be expensed in the 2018-19 financial year.
